title: Luisa Omielan's Politics for Bitches
overview:
Comedian Luisa Omielan is on a mission to educate young people about 
politics and why it is so important. Trouble is, she finds it 
intimidating, inaccessible and has no idea what she is talking about. 
She tackles the subject by learning on the job and travelling around the
 UK with her dog Bernie, exploring issues that matter to people like 
her. Part stand-up gig, part documentary, this series looks at some of 
the most important things relevant to young people today.
